CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luxury Resorts relative to Vacation Rentals?
SRP.A: Luxury Resorts is {below} Vacation Rentals in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Boutique Inns}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total hotel occupancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luxury Resorts}.

VE.Q: What is Business Hotels's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1961?
VE.A: Business Hotels's hotel occupancy rate in 1961 is {57.99} %.

VE.Q: What is Luxury Resorts's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1956?
VE.A: Luxury Resorts's hotel occupancy rate in 1956 is {52.71} %.

VE.Q: What is Eco Lodges's Hotel Occupancy Rate in 1966?
VE.A: Eco Lodges's hotel occupancy rate in 1966 is {46.45} %.

VE.Q: What are the hotel occupancy rate of Eco Lodges, Vacation Rentals, and Luxury Resorts in 1967?
VE.A: Eco Lodges's hotel occupancy rate is {41.03} %, Vacation Rentals's hotel occupancy rate is {100} %, Luxury Resorts's hotel occupancy rate is {16.79} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum hotel occupancy rate is {12.69} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Hotel Occupancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum hotel occupancy rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Hotel Occupancy Rate level recorded for Airbnb Hosts?
What is the lowest Hotel Occupancy Rate level recorded for Airbnb Hosts?
EVJ.A: Airbnb Hosts's lowest recorded level is approximately {53.43} % in {1957}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate?
SC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate is {460.22} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate go below 422.67 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate fall between 434.06 and 479.75 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate exceed 491.13 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1954 and 1964, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 1955 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1954 and 1964 was {higher} than between 1955 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1965, did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1962 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total hotel occupancy rate between 1955 and 1965 was {larger} than between 1962 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1962, was the average total Hotel Occupancy Rate higher or lower than between 1959 and 1960?
NC.A: The average total hotel occupancy rate between 1960 and 1962 was {lower} than between 1959 and 1960.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1968, did the total Hotel Occupancy Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1956 and 1958?
NC.A: The change in total hotel occupancy rate between 1959 and 1968 was {larger} than between 1956 and 1958.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Boutique Inns} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Budget Motels, Luxury Resorts, Business Hotels, Eco Lodges, Airbnb Hosts, Boutique Inns, Vacation Rentals}.
